do stanice v sektoru {sector.name@{param@StationSector}}(stanice v sektoru)

page.title: L2M133 Generic Anti Smuggler Police
page.t: V sektoru jsi neoskenoval žádné lodi!

Tady máš zprávu, pilote.\nDokázal jsi oskenovat {value@L2M133.TotalShipsScanned} lodí, ze kterých {value@L2M133.IllegalShipCount} obsahovalo nelegální zboží. To přispělo k celkové hodnotě nelegálního zboží ve výši {value@L2M133.Catch} kreditů.
Vypadá to, že jsi dokázal chytit nějaké převaděče lidí! Působivé.
To bylo tedy zatčení! Policie sektoru {sector.name@L2M133.Sector} ti děkuje.
No tak to nebylo moc dobré, pilote, nebo snad ano? Několik pašeráků naší sítí nejspíš prošlo!
Vydělal sis za tuto práci {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.
Pilote, ty jsi neoskenoval žádné lodi. Co jsi to dělal?
Snímáme data tvých senzorů.\nDokázal jsi oskenovat {value@L2M133.TotalShipsScanned} lodí s celkovou hodnotou nákladu ve výši {value@L2M133.Catch} kreditů.
Vidím, že jsi spatřil nějaké potenciální otroky.
Myslím, že plundrování nám nyní nějaký čas zabere! Děkuji.
Jménem policejních sil rasy {lookup.race.name@{value@L2M133.OfferRace}} ti děkuji za plýtvání naším časem. Dávej si pozor!
Za tuto práci sis vydělal {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.
Neoskenoval jsi vůbec žádné lodi. Takže hodně lodí nám zřejmě uniklo, určitě byly naložené vesmírným palivem! Nemůžeme tolerovat lenochy, takže za tuto práci nedostaneš zaplaceno.
Nechytil jsi nikoho s ilegálním zbožím. Aspoň jsi to ale zkusil. Protože jsi oskenoval {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} lodí, dostaneš {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.
To nebylo špatné. Oskenoval jsi {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} lodí a nalezl nelegální zboží za {value@L2M133.Catch} kreditů. Rozhodli jsme se ti zaplatit {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.
Tak to byl dobrý úlovek! Oskenoval jsi {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} lodí a našel ilegální zboží za {value@L2M133.Catch} kreditů. Rozhodli jsme se ti zaplatit {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.

Neoskenoval jsi žádné lodi. Takže během doby, kdy ses jen tak rozhlížel, proplulo kolem neuvěřitelné množství nákladu. Pokud budeš chtít ještě někdy v budoucnosti pro mne pracovat, tak leda jako inspektor bezpečnosti přechodové kabiny.
Vůbec nic jsi nenašel! No, ale vzhledem k tomu, že jsi oskenoval {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} lodí, tak ti dám tak {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.

Docela dobrý úlovek. Naši lidé budou náklad sledovat a lodi zlikvidují v pravý čas. Oskenoval jsi {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} lodí a našel náklad za {value@L2M133.Catch} kreditů. Tady je tvůj podíl: {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.

Příteli, to byl ale dobrý úlovek! Oskenoval jsi {value@L2M133.ScannedCount} lodí a nalezl zboží v hodnotě {value@L2M133.Catch} kreditů! Doženeme je a slušně se jich zeptáme, jestli by se nechtěli o své bohatství podělit. Tady je tvůj podíl: {value@L2M133.Reward} kreditů.
Protipašerácká policie je potřeba k tomu, aby omezila nelegální zboží, které proudí všemi sektory.
Protipašerácká policie je potřeba k tomu, aby omezila nelegální zboží, které proudí sektorem {sector.name@{param@Sector}}.
Protipašerácká policie musí zachytit nelegální zboží pašované sektory rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}}.
Protipašerácká policie musí zachytit nelegální zboží pašované hlavními sektory rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}}.
Protipašerácká policie musí zachytit nelegální zboží pašované hraničními sektory rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}}.
Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} kvůli nelegálnímu zboží. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor.
Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v sektoru {sector.name@{param@Sector}} kvůli nelegálnímu zboží. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor.
Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} kvůli nelegálnímu zboží. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor.

Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v hlavních sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} kvůli nelegálnímu zboží. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor.

Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v hraničních sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} kvůli nelegálnímu zboží. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor.

Vyšší počet vojenských jednotek v oblasti snížil příjem mnoha pilotů na volné noze. Potřebujeme zkušeného pilota, který by proscannoval všechny lodě typu {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v tomto sektoru. Pokud budou výsledky scannování zajímavé, podělíme se o kořist.

Policejní aktivita v této oblasti nám, pilotům na volné noze, citelně snížila příjmy. Potřebujeme zkušeného pilota, který by proscannoval lodě typu {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v sektoru {sector.name@{param@Sector}} a našel cenné zboží, které by se nám mohlo hodit.

Policejní aktivita v této oblasti nám, pilotům na volné noze, citelně snížila příjmy. Potřebujeme zkušeného pilota, který by proscannoval lodě typu {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v sektorech {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}}.

Policejní aktivita v sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} byla poslední dobou vlažná. Rádi bychom toho využili a něco si vydělali. Potřebujeme zkušeného pilota, který by oskenoval jakékoli {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v hlavních sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} a ohlásil zajímavé nálezy.

Policie rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} byla stažena do hlavních sektorů, aby se vypořádala se vzrůstajícím pašováním lidí. Toho bychom rádi využili a něco si vydělali na okrajích sektoru. Potřebujeme zkušeného pilota, který by oskenoval jakékoli {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v hraničních sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}}.

Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} kvůli nákladu, který by stálo za to ukrást. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor. Čím více nákladu najdeš, tím více ti zaplatíme.

Oskenuj jakékoli {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v sektoru {sector.name@{param@Sector}} kvůli nákladu, který by stálo za to ukrást. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor. Čím více nákladu najdeš, tím více ti zaplatíme.

Oskenuj jakékoli {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} kvůli hodnotnému zboží. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor. Čím více nákladu najdeš, tím více ti zaplatíme.

Oskenuj jakékoli {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v hlavních sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} kvůli nákladu, který by stálo za to ukrást. Použij skener nákladu a prohlédni jejich nákladový prostor. Čím více nákladu najdeš, tím více ti zaplatíme.

Oskenuj {lookup.class.name@{value@L0M33 B.ShipClass}} v hraničních sektorech rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@SectorRace}} a hledej náklad, který stojí za to ukrást. Použij nákladní skener k prohlédnutí nákladového prostoru. Čím více nákladu najdeš, tím více peněz dostaneš.

page.title: L2M134 Generic Patrol
page.t: Hlídka dokončena, pilote. Žádná nepřátelská loď nebyla zničena. I tak ti zaplatíme {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů za čas, který jsi tu strávil.
Jen jeden nepřátelský kontakt byl zlikvidován. To stačí. Díky za čas. Převedli jsme ti {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Velmi dobrá práce na hlídce.\nZlikvidoval jsi {value@L2M134.TotalShips} lodí a vydělal si za svou snahu {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Nemáš k dokončení této mise dostatečnou proslulost. Tvůj kontrakt byl ukončen.
Hlídka dokončena, pilote. Buď bylo ticho po pěšině, nebo jsme se v tobě zmýlili. Nezlikvidoval jsi žádné nepřátelské lodi. I tak ti zaplatíme za snahu {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Zlikvidoval jsi jenom jeden nepřátelský kontakt. To nevadí, i malá pomoc je dobrá. Díky za čas. Převedli jsme ti {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Dobrá práce na hlídce.\nZničil jsi {value@L2M134.TotalShips} lodí a vydělal sis za svou snahu {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Kdybych věděl, že s tebou budou takové problémy, tak bych ti tu práci nedal. Mise skončena.
Hlídka dokončena, pilote. Buď bylo ticho po pěšině, nebo jsme se v tobě zmýlili. Nezlikvidoval jsi žádné nepřátelské lodi. I tak ti zaplatíme za snahu {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Zlikvidoval jsi jen jeden nepřátelský kontakt. Snad to bude příště lepší. Za snahu jsme ti převedli {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Dobrá práce na hlídce.\nZlikvidoval jsi {value@L2M134.TotalShips} lodí a vydělal si za svou snahu {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Nepotřebujeme pomoci od takových, jako jsi ty. Mise skončena.
Aktivita Xenonů se snižuje, což sis jistě nevšiml. Nedokázal jsi zlikvidovat žádný xenonský kontakt. I tak ti ale za tvůj čas zaplatíme {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Zlikvidoval jsi jediný xenonský kontakt. Jsem si jistý, že to Xenony od dalších útoků neodradí. Za tvou snahu ti převádíme {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Dobrá práce, pilote.\nZlikvidoval jsi {value@L2M134.TotalShips} xenonských lodí. Možná si teď Xenoni dobře rozmyslí, jestli příště zaútočí. Vydělal sis {value@L2M134.Reward} kreditů.
Myslím, že se dokážeme ubránit Xenonům i bez tebe. Zmiz odsud!
Uvolnila se pozice v místních pořádkových silách pro jakéhokoli pilota s bojovými zkušenostmi. Hlídka vede do sektoru {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}.
Hlídkuj v sektoru {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}. Znič jakéhokoli nepřítele rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}}.
Uvolnila se pozice v místních pořádkových silách pro jakéhokoli pilota s bojovými zkušenostmi. Hlídkovat se bude v sektoru {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}.
Hlídkuj v sektoru{sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}. Znič jakékoli nepřátele rasy {lookup.race.name@{param@OfferRace}}.

Máme důvodné podezření, že v blízké době se aktivita Xenonů zvýší. Potřebujeme obranné lodi a častější hlídkování v sektoru {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}}. Dej pozor, aktivita Xenonů může být během této hlídky nejvyšší.
Hlídkuj v sektoru {sector.name@{param@FinalSector}} a braň ho proti xenonským lodím. Buď připraven na rozsáhlou xenonskou invazi.

page.title: L2 Defend Object
page.t: Piráti zaútočí na mou stanici! Řekli mi, že pokud nezaplatím, přiletí a zničí stanici {object.name@L2M135.Station}. Nemohu si dovolit jim teď zaplatit a potřebuji, aby mi někdo pomohl.
Hej, pár podivných existencí mi řeklo, že mé stanici se stane něco strašného, pokud jim nezaplatím za "ochranu". Rozhodl jsem se, že bych si měl tedy zaplatit nějakou ochranu, než se vrátí!
Díky, určitě se jen tak brzy nevrátí. {{actor.voice@L2M135 Offer.Guide},2005}

page.title: Search For Object
page.descr: Text for search for object mission
page.t: Myslím, že velmi výtěžný asteroid se nachází daleko od středu tohoto sektoru.

Myslím, že velmi výtěžný asteroid se nachází daleko od středu tohoto sektoru. Hledej kolem tohoto místa: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
Myslím, že je tu skupina velmi výtěžných asteroidů daleko od středu tohoto sektoru.

Myslím, že je tu skupina velmi výtěžných asteroidů, které se nacházejí daleko od středu tohoto sektoru. Hledej kolem tohoto místa: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
Platba bude obdržena po nalezení asteroidu.
Platba bude obdržena po nalezení asteroidů.
Myslím, že daleko od středu tohoto sektoru se nachází zvláštní loď.

Myslím, že daleko od středu tohoto sektoru se nachází zvláštní loď. Hledej kolem tohoto místa: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
Myslím, že daleko od středu tohoto sektoru se nachází skupina lodí.

Myslím, že daleko od středu tohoto sektoru se nachází skupina lodí. Hledej kolem tohoto místa: X = {object.position.x.m@L2M137.Object}m, Y = {object.position.y.m@L2M137.Object}m, Z = {object.position.z.m@L2M137.Object}m.
Platba bude obdržena po nalezení lodi.
Platba bude obdržena po nalezení lodí.

page.title: L2M145 Scan Asteroids
page.descr: Text for the scan asteroids mission
page.t: Data o asteroidu obdržena. Vidím, že jsi oskenoval všechny asteroidy na seznamu; můj zaměstnavatel bude potěšen. Jak bylo dohodnuto, dostaneš {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} kreditů. Děkuji a šťastnou cestu.

Data o asteroidu obdržena a ověřena. Vidím, že jsi oskenoval asteroid s vysokou výtěžností. To je velmi zajímavý nález. Vydělal sis {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} kreditů. Tuto informaci předám nadřízeným.

Data o asteroidu obdržena. Neuvěřitelné! Nividiový asteroid. To je velmi nečekané. Můj zaměstnavatel bude potěšen. Jak bylo dohodnuto, dostaneš {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} kreditů. Děkuji a šťastnou cestu.

Datový tok o asteroidu obdržen. Dodal jsi data jen o {value@L2M145.ScannedCount} asteroidech. Byl tu nějaký problém? Možná byla naše počáteční informace zastaralá. Nevidím tak žádný důvod, proč snížit tvoji odměnu. Dostaneš {value.formatted@L2M145.RewardCr} kreditů.
Lhůta vypršela a stále jsi nedodal informace. Doufám, že sis je nenechal pro sebe. Můj zaměstnavatel z toho nebude nadšený.
Co to je? Není tu žádná informace o asteroidu. Má budoucnost v této organizaci je ohrožena, a to všechno kvůli tvému selhání. Odejdi.

Můj zaměstnavatel se zajímá o složení asteroidů v této oblasti. Bohužel mám příliš zaplněný kalendář, než abych tuto práci udělal sám. Je potřeba, abys dodal skeny pro {group.object.count@{param@GroupName}} asteroidů v {value@this.DiffCount} sektorech.\n{35,2167}{17,2753}

Můj zaměstnavatel se zajímá o složení asteroidů v této oblasti. Bohužel mám příliš zaplněný kalendář, než abych tuto práci udělal sám. Jsou potřeba skeny {group.object.count@{param@GroupName}} asteroidů v sektoru{object.sector.name@this.Nearest}.\n{35,2167}{17,2753}

Můj zaměstnavatel se zajímá o složení asteroidů v této oblasti. Bohužel mám příliš zaplněný kalendář, než abych tuto práci udělal sám. Jsou potřeba skeny asteroidu v sektoru {object.sector.name@this.Nearest}.\n{35,2167}{17,2753}
{actor.name@L2M145.Offerguy} chce znát všechna data o asteroidech v rámci časového limitu.

page.title: L2 Buy Used Ship
page.t: Prodávám použitou loď. Je v dobrém stavu. Její cena je {value.formatted@L2M150a.iShipPrice} kreditů.
Už nepotřebuji svou loď {object.type.name@L2M150a.UsedShip}, protože jsem koupil nový model. Prodám ji za {value.formatted@L2M150a.iShipPrice} kreditů.
Chtěl bych si koupit novou loď, ale potřebuji více kreditů. Jsem ochoten se rozloučit se svou starou dobrou lodí {object.type.name@L2M150a.UsedShip} za {value.formatted@L2M150a.iShipPrice} kreditů.

page.title: L1 Corporation Missions
page.t: {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} byl v minulých týdnech spatřen, jak útočí na několik našich lodí. Je potřeba se s ním vypořádat.
Velmi dobře. {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} už nám způsobil hodně škody. Dáme ti vědět, až budeme mít pro tebe další práci.

Docházejí nám zásoby a potřebujeme dodávku do {object.name@{param@HQ}} obsahující {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} a {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}}.

Docházejí nám zásoby a potřebujeme dodávku do {object.name@{param@HQ}} obsahující {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} a {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}}.
Docházejí nám zásoby a potřebujeme dodávku do {object.name@{param@HQ}}, v níž bude {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.

Následující dodávka zboží je potřeba: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}} a {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}}.

Následující dodávka zboží je potřeba: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}} a {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware2}}.
Následující dodávka zboží je potřeba: {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1Amt} x {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}.
Děkujeme. Tyto zásoby budou zřejmě nepostradatelné. Dáme ti vědět, až pro tebe budeme mít další práci.
Něco se dostalo na palubu {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} v {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, potřebuji se o to postarat. Můžeš sem přiletět co nejdříve?

Potřebuji se setkat s majitelem stanice na palubě {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} v sektoru {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} a probrat obchodní práva. Potřebuji, abys mě tam dopravil co nejrychleji.

Potřebuji se dostat na schůzku na palubě {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest} v sektoru {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}. Je důležité, abych udělal dojem, takže vyžaduji osobní transportér třídy TP.
Právě je ohrožen {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object}. Jsou potřeba piloti navíc, aby jej pomohli chránit!
Útokem pirátské frakce je ohrožen {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object}. Jsou potřeba piloti navíc, aby jej ochránili, pokud piráti splní své hrozby.

Domníváme se, že {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} v sektoru {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} bude brzy napaden piráty! Nemůžeme si dovolit nechat jej piráty poškodit. Leť tam a pomoz v případě, že se piráti objeví!
Vypadá to, že {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} je nyní v bezpečí. Děkujeme. Dáme ti vědět, až bude v nabídce další práce.
Děkujeme. Protože hrozba ze strany pirátů byla zažehnána, obyvatelé {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} Object} mohou zase v klidu spát. Musíme ti najít v budoucnosti těžší úkoly!
Piráti ohrožují samotnou naši existenci. Potřebujeme piloty k obraně {object.name@{param@HQ}}!
Vypadá to, že {object.name@{param@HQ}} je nyní v bezpečí. Děkujeme. Dáme vědět, až bude k dispozici další práce.
Myslíme, že {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} proti nám tajně pracuje. Tvůj úkol je pronásledovat {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} a zjistit, s kým se setkává a jaký je jeho cíl.

Dobrá práce, pilote. Už tu někoho máme, kdo se pomocí hackingu dostane k seznamu cestujících. To nám pomůže odhalit aktivity, které vyvíjí {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}. Dáme ti vědět, až bude nějaká další práce.

Vypadá to, že {actor.name@{param@Cue}.2 L0Mark} určitě pracuje proti naší společnosti. Oba, {actor.name@{param@Cue}.2 L0Mark} a {actor.name@{param@Cue}.3 L0Mark}, musejí být za své zločiny zlikvidováni.
Náš velmi cenný konvoj vyžaduje ochranu. Prosím setkej se s konvojem v sektoru {sector.name@L2M41.MissionSector} a ochraň jej, dokud nedorazí do místa určení.
Vypadá to, že tvá pomoc byla znovu velmi cenná. Musíme se podívat, jestli pro tebe nemáme ještě nějaké obtížnější mise.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} potřebuje dopravit sem z {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} v sektoru {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, aby s námi probral obchodní dohodu. Můžeš ho rychle vyzvednout?

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} potřebuje dopravit sem z {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} v sektoru {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, aby s námi probral obchodní dohodu. Musíme vypadat dobře, takže budeš potřebovat osobní transportér, kterým ho vyzvedneš.

Máme tu skupinu obchodních partnerů, kteří odpočívají během vyjednávání o obchodních dohodách a chtějí vidět místní pamětihodnosti. Můžeš je vyzvednout osobním transportérem a ukázat jim místní sektory? Zkus jim ukázat něco zajímavého!
OK, zvládl jsi to dobře a vypadají potěšeně. Musím nyní na další jednání. Dám ti vědět, pokud se naskytne další práce.
Zjistili jsme, že {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} chce předat tajná data svému kontaktu. Je nutné mu zabránit v dosažení jeho cíle.
Pomohl jsi nám zabránit významnému bezpečnostnímu problému. Dobrá práce! Dáme ti vědět, až bude další práce.

page.title: L0 Assassination
page.t: Setkej se s {actor.name@OBJ01.Guide} na stanici {object.name@OBJ01.dest}, {object.sector.name@OBJ01.dest}. Dá ti důležité informace o {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}.

{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} je v sektoru {object.sector.name@{actor.ship@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}} letí v lodi {actor.ship.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} - {actor.ship.code@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}
Je tu kontakt, který odhalil, kde se nachází {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}. Řekne nám, kde je.
Musíš se setkat s mým kontaktem, který je poblíž. Ten ti řekne důležité informace o {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}.
Naštěstí pro tebe už jsem najal někoho, kdo ho najde, takže se musíš setkat s ním, on ti pak řekne, kde se cíl nachází.
Co jsi dělal? Dal jsem ti dost času, aby ses zbavil {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}, a tys to ještě neudělal? Tak na to zapomeň!

page.title: L0 Steal Ship
page.t: {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} je v sektoru {object.sector.name@{actor.ship@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}} letí v lodi {actor.ship.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} - {actor.ship.code@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark}. Potřebujeme, abys loď {actor.ship.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} - {actor.ship.code@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Mark} přivezl zpět bez škrábnutí.\n\nDonuť ho se katapultovat!
OK, teď mi dodej {lookup.type.name@{param@Ware}} sem na stanici {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest}.
OK, teď dodej {object.type.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} a {lookup.type.name@{param@Ware}} na stanici {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest}.
OK, přivez nám {object.type.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} na stanici {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest}.
OK přivez nám {object.type.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target} zpět na stanici {object.name@L0M02 Drop.Dest} kvůli analýze.
Pamatuj, musíš letět v {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target}, aby si myslel, že jsi jeho kontakt.
Výborně, teď se jenom musíme zbavit důkazů.\n\nRychle znič {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Target}, než to někdo bude moci spojit s námi.
Velmi dobře, musíš se dostat na stanici {object.name@this.Dest} a tam se setkat s {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0EnemyAgent} a získat informace.
Velmi dobře, musíš se dostat na stanici {object.name@this.Dest} a tam se setkat s {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0EnemyAgent} a získat {lookup.type.name@{param@Ware}}

page.title: L0 Transport Passenger
page.t: Setkej se s {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Passenger} na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}. Pak ho vyhoď na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.

Vyzvedni mě tady na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}. Potřebuji se dostat na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
OK, dostaň mě na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
Sežeň si systém podpory života v nákladovém prostoru!
Udělej mi tu místo.\nAsi {lookup.type.cargospace@SS_WARE_PASSENGER} nákladových jednotek by stačilo.
Měl jsi mě už dávno vyzvednout! Mise se ruší.
Vypadá to, že cíl mé cesty byl zničen! Mise se ruší.

Děkuji za zboží {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware1}}, pilote. Nakonec mi musíš dovézt {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3Amt} jednotek zboží {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Ware3}} na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Station}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M04Station}

page.title: L0 Battle Ships
page.t: {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}}! Odhaleni poblíž {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} EntryGate}. Braň sektor {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} EntryGate} za každou cenu!

page.title: L0 Follow Ship
page.t: OK, {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0FollowShip} jsme naposledy viděli v sektoru {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0FollowShip}. Měl by ses tam rozletět co nejrychleji a pronásledovat je do jejich základny.
To vypadá jako ta loď, sleduj je až do jejich základny. Pokus se příliš nepřibližovat, aby si nevšimli, že jsou sledováni.
Jsi příliš blízko, nelep se tak na ně!
A jak je asi teď budeš sledovat?
Ztratil jsi je? A jak je teď budeš sledovat?

page.title: L0 Transport Cargo
page.t: Setkej se s {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Holder} na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}. Vyzvedni {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}} a vylož je na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.

Vyzvedni {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}} ode mě tady na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start} a vylož je na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.

Vyzvedni {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}} od {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Holder} na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}. Já budu na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, tak je sem dovez.

Vyzvedni {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}} od {actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Holder} na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Start}. Pak mi je dovez sem na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
Dodej je na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
{actor.name@L0M16.Client} je očekává na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}, {object.sector.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
Měl jsi už dávno vyzvednout mé zboží! Mise zrušena.
Vypadá to, že cíl transportu byl zničen. Mise zrušena.
Vypadá to, že místo, kde jsi měl vyzvednout zboží, bylo zničeno! Mise zrušena.
{actor.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16ClientDummy} byl zabit. Musíš odevzdat zboží mně na stanici {object.name@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0Dest}.
Pospěš si a dodej mi můj {lookup.type.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}}!
Asi {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Amount} jednotek nákladu by mohlo stačit.
Musíš vyčistit aspoň {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Amount} jednotek nákladu.
Musíš udělat aspoň {value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Amount} jednotek místa ve svém nákladovém prostoru.
Možná není tvoje loď dost velká?
Musíš být schopen transportovat zboží třídy {lookup.type.cargoclass.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}} !
Tvoje loď nedokáže transportovat zboží třídy {lookup.type.cargoclass.name@{value@{param@Cue}.{param@ID} L0M16Ware}}!

page.title: Generic player replies
page.t: OK, udělám za vás tu špinavou práci.
To mi za ten čas nestojí.
Na to nemám čas, na shledanou!
Dobře jsme si popovídali, ale ne, děkuji.
Jak to jde? Co máš v plánu?
Hledám někoho, kdo umí hacknout stanici.
Dokážeš se hacknout do počítače stanice?
Potřebuji, aby se z nepřátelské stanice stala neutrální.
Můžeš mi pomoci s nepřátelskou stanicí?
Rád bych koupil nějaká data o asteroidech.
Máš na prodej nějaká data o asteroidech?
Zajímají mě výnosy z místních asteroidů...
Máš na prodej nějaká nová data o asteroidech?
Rád bych si koupil pár sektorových map.
Máš na prodej nějaké sektorové mapy?
Máš na prodej nějaké místní sektorové mapy?
Máš na prodej nějaké konstrukční plány?
Nějaké nové konstrukční plány na prodej?
Máš nějaké schéma lodi na prodej?
Chci konstrukční plány pro nejnovější lodi.
K jakým lodím máš konstrukční plány?
Slyšel jsem, že tě zajímají schémata lodí.
Slyšel jsem, že tu prodáváš zboží.
Slyšel jsem, že tu máš nepotřebné zboží.
Chtěl bych nějaká nová data o objektech.
Slyšel jsem, že tu prodáváš data.
Máš tu nějaké mariňáky, které bych mohl najmout?
Slyšel jsem, že máš pár mariňáků, které bys mohl postrádat.

page.title: Boardcomp. Sectornames
page.descr: Names of all sectors (spoken by Boardcomputer)

page.title: Boardcomp. objects
page.t: Accepting that advances in weapon and shield technology in recent years had reduced the Lasertower's effectiveness, the designers released this upgraded model. With new firmware and a revised power distribution system, the Lasertower's power output has increased by more than 45%, while reconfiguring of the beam weapon's generators and focus optics have greatly boosted its ability to defend against capital ships.

A product of reverse-engineering Xenon technology and combining it with Terran knowledge, the Jump Beacon continuously transmits large quantities of encrypted coordinate and spatial data across a high frequency communication channel through the gate network, a method pioneered in the trusty Navigation Satellites commonly used throughout the galaxy. This data provides a ship's jumpdrive with the information it needs to maintain the stability of its wormhole all the way through to its destination, eliminating the need for a jump to end at a gate.

The Type IV corvette is one of the oldest designs still flying today. Though it has seen many system upgrades, the actual chassis has seen very few structural changes since its original implementation in the schematics of the AP Gunner; the vessel which propelled Nathan R. Gunne beyond the Sol system and into the X-Universe.

The Phantom is the latest offering from the famous Omicron Lyrae Shipyards. Designed to compete in the same market niche as the Hyperion, it combines luxurious interior suites with a reinforced hull and enhanced shield generators, making it the perfect vessel for use as a private yacht for the wealthy entrepreneur.(||) The vessel has minimal defensive armament, but is capable of defending itself from the scattered pirate raiders which plague the universe. The current design still contains a number of minor faults, but has been deemed safe for sale to the mass market.

The Boron Sturgeon is a heavily armoured alternative to the ageing Dolphin. Still undergoing development, the design remains subject to unexpected system errors and navigation issues. Despite these flaws, the Kingdom of Boron is continuing funding for further development of the ship.(||) Deemed sufficiently stable for public use, the prototype was released to market a few months ago. The latest version has received updates its navigation system, but is otherwise no different from the first iteration.

To counter the potential threat of the Split heavy destroyer, Queen Menelaus demanded that a new flagship, symbolising the military strength of the Kingdom of Boron must be built. The Megalodon is the result; effectively a more powerful version of the Boron Ray, it is equipped with superior armament, shielding and energy to that of its older sister.(||) The greatest improvement, however, is a new form of life support system. Normally, Boron ships are filled with a regular ammonium solution, the Megalodon instead uses a specially formulated mixture of water, helium, ammonium and artificial adrenaline. This makes the crew much more responsive to external stimuli, allowing for greatly increased combat and command performance. As a downside, Argon communications officers state that it is intolerable to listen to long speeches of a Megalodon's crewmember over the communication link due to the extremely high pitch.

This heavily armed freight transporter was recently called into service to provide a more secure way of ferrying top-grade Split military equipment.(||) Armed with multiple turrets and exceptional defences, the Drake is quite possibly the most aggressive transporter in the universe. Though the ship appears slow and bulky, the engines were specifically upgraded to provide acceleration and speed unmatched by any other vessel of its class. Split military forces have employed a garrison of these ships and retrofitted them for high-yield explosive compatibility. These ships are then stripped of most equipment and used as lures for pirate raiders. While this method is expensive, Split generals say that the cost is nothing compared to the sight of the explosion it provides.

The Ocelot is a fast, sleek and aggressive luxury cruiser. Initially designed to serve as a fleet coordination and recon corvette, the need for such a vessel in current Split military operations proved infinitely small.(||) In order to avoid losing out on governmental funding, the design team quickly re-modelled the interior to accommodate several luxury suites and released the design to the general public.

Sensing the need for a new transporter for risky, high-profit situations, the Teladi designed the Tern. Marked as a long-term investment, the Tern was built with an unusually high degree of redundancy for a Teladi vessel.(||) A single Tern is estimated to be able to outperform any three regular transporters, ensuring that the extra credits spent on each ship would repay themselves in a relatively short amount of time. As the Tern was primarily intended to ferry large high-tech cargoes, it soon became a firm favourite of smugglers and black-market ware dealers.

The Geochen is an unusual ship; a luxury liner designed by a race with very little sense for aesthetics or luxury in general.(||) The design and controls were modified for non-Teladi pilots, as even the manufacturers of the Geochen realized that the ship would have little marketability among the Teladi themselves. Even so, the ship is still built on the tried and tested basic Teladi principles of high shielding and relatively low speed. The huge cargo bay is another bonus, allowing it to hold months' worth of provisions for solitary exile voyages.

Seeing the need for better protection of military grade equipment transports, the United Space Command submitted a requisition to ship design teams for a heavily armoured transporter with capacity for high-volume freight. Following trials of multiple submissions, the Mars-designed Hayabusa was the model deemed most suited to the USC's needs.(||) Multiple layers of armour plating on top of a triple-hull, paired with military-grade power systems and finely tuned engines enable this ship to ferry highly sensitive equipment through anything the universe can throw at it. The designers boast that it could easily run through an AGI blockade while fully laden with minimal damage.

With the number of Terran billionaires and space-based entrepreneurs growing, the market for a strictly Terran-designed luxury cruiser was recognised. The Mani is the result.(||) Made to fill the gap in the civil markets, it is reasonably heavily armed and adequately shielded, though the actual luxury aspect has taken a secondary role. Built to impress rather than please, the Mani is the posing vessel of the year as impractical as it is fashionable.

Recognising the need for a more powerful capital ship that would not be controlled strictly by the AGI Task Force, the United Space Command opted to develop their own super-heavy destroyer to perform tasks which the ATF would not. The Kyoto is currently one of the most powerful ships in service with the Terran military.(||) It bears a close resemblance to the Osaka, but closer inspection reveals numerous upgrades and reconfigurations of the internal structure, which result improved combat performance at no additional expense. A surprisingly large amount of the ship's internal systems are operated autonomously without direct human supervision; a feature that sets this vessel apart from its ATF cousin.

The United Space Command commissioned the Toukon after seeing the value of the TM class ships used by the Commonwealth races.(||) Intended to serve as a rapid response patrol carrier, the Toukon improves on established designs without adding any experimental or unstable features. Essentially a Terran variant of the widely successful Magnetar, the Toukon combines the best of both worlds with virtually no downsides.

This powerful destroyer has not been seen anywhere before. It closely follows the standard Xenon design principles, and appears to be a direct response to recent developments in the super-heavy destroyer field.(||) The exact power and threat levels of this ship are not known, but it is advised to run as far away as possible at the first sight of this ship. Like all other Xenon ships, it still contains a redundant crew deck, theoretically enabling living creatures to pilot it.

The Snotra was designed to cover the one area the aging Demeter could not fulfil - rapid transportation of high value military grade hardware.(||) Following the latest Paranid design trends inspired by prototype ships such as the Agamemnon and Heavy Nemesis, the Snotra has lost its former basic utilitarian structure in favour of a more elaborate, artistic profile. The core of the ship has not changed greatly, though - the basic cargo compression systems are taken directly out of other transporters and interior decorations have been left at a minimum. Though the Snotra was designed as a military ship, it is available to any trader rich and influential enough to afford one.

Following the trend of employing drone carriers in border patrol duty, a strategy established by the Argon with their successful Griffon prototype, the Paranid Empire issued an order for a drone frigate design of their own. Superior to the early Griffon variants in every way, the current Ariadne, the result of several months of corporate espionage and outright plagiarism, is indeed a vastly improved version of the Argon prototype.(||) Unfortunately, the Ariadne is still considered very much a work in progress, and retains a number of issues that would not appear in a more polished, finalised version. Due to pressure from the Priest Kings, the prototype Ariadne blueprints were sent to all major Paranid shipyards before the actual ship could be put through field tests. Nevertheless, the military has not reported any major issues with the ship as yet, so for all intents and purposes, it is a bona fide drone frigate, well worth its price.

Developed by OTAS corporation in collaboration with every major race in the galaxy, these advanced drones use Heuristic Autonomous Logarithms to acquire targets and can successfully predict a pilot's manoeuvres, evasive actions and skill with 91% accuracy after 12-20 seconds of motion analysis.(||) Although OTAS are promoting these advanced drones as the 'end of manned fighters', many merchants and fleet commanders are unnerved by their efficiency, some going as far as to even label them 'Xenon efficient'. OTAS deny rumours that the drone A.I. consists of reverse-engineered Xenon subroutines and assure their customers that they are safe and reliable.

After public objections to the number of pilots' lives lost in skirmishes against pirates and AGI, the Terran Federation commissioned a new drone frigate design for military use. The Maccana is a semi-automated vessel, allowing for a much smaller crew contingent than other Terran vessels of its size.(||) Its greatest advantage however is the completely automated drone maintenance line, which requires only four overseers. The development of the Maccana is still ongoing, but successful test versions have already been released to the general market, as field tests have proved them to be essentially safe and stable.

The Griffon was the design which kicked off development of similar drone frigates by the other races. Developed with technology bought from the black market, initially originating from Aldrin, its design is surprisingly simple.(||) An exposed framework supporting the drones, a single maintenance line and modified sensor arrays are all that sets this frigate apart from any other capital ship. Even though there are now more technologically advanced drone frigates on the market, the Griffon has had the time to be refined into what is arguably the most reliable frigate in the known universe. With 11 layers of failsafes and multiple redundancies, the ship simply never gives up.

The latest result of the new Boron military diversification campaign, the Guppy is doubtlessly one of the most refined examples of speciality shipbuilding in Boron history.(||) Sleek, spacious and menacing, the Guppy is an excellent border patrol leader. Though it is not the leading vessel in any one characteristic when compared to other drone frigates, the Guppy provides the most rounded and balanced performance. Although it is estimated to be almost twice as expensive to produce as regular frigates, the Guppy is still relatively affordable thanks to heavy government subsidisation. This ship has acquired a status in the industry, serving as the yardstick for its class.

Initially designed as a mini-carrier, the Panther proved ineffective in real combat situations and unsuitable for supporting the required pilots and support crews for extended periods of time. With the advance of drone manufacturing technology, the Panther was quickly remodelled to serve as a drone frigate.(||) The improved concept proved itself worthy after a single month of automated patrols. Thanks to a newly designed sensor array, the Panther can manage a large quantity of drones over great distances. The numerous failsafes installed by outsourced Teladi engineers ensure that the Panther's drones can operate without supervision for extended periods of time.

The Cormorant is the Teladi Company's response to the recent drone frigate trend that has taken the Commonwealth militaries by storm.(||) Cheap, rough, sturdy and completely devoid of any aesthetic embellishment, the Cormorant fulfils its major function of drone management without any unnecessary fuss. Though construction quality is estimated to be extremely low, there are as yet no known cases of these ships spontaneously exploding in flight. The Teladi military has purchased a number of Cormorants, but the main purpose of this ship is to fill a market niche, which is the one task it completely fulfils.

Following skirmishes with Commonwealth forces, the USC were impressed with the potential of Lasertowers for protecting remote sectors without committing an expensive Destroyer.(||) The Terran Orbital Laser is a reverse-engineered and upgraded Terran copy created from samples purchased by some of the few Commonwealth traders allowed into Terran territory. During the design phase, emphasis was moved from fighter defence to a robust anti-capital ship weapon. Even with the recent upgrades to the Commonwealth Lasertower, the Orbital Laser provides a superior defensive emplacement.

Following changes to galactic laws which legalised open trading of stocks and shares, the Teladi Company quickly established a number of these Stock Exchanges. Anyone with a few credits can now purchase shares in a large variety of commodities, companies and corporations. Even in the short time that these stations have been trading, many fortunes have been gained and lost. Each transaction incurs a small brokerage fee, which the Teladi Company claims for services rendered.

The rapid expansion of the Plutarch Mining Corporation led to a sudden surplus of raw minerals. To relieve mines of excess stock and avoid flooding the market, several storage stations were constructed. As production levels stabilised and the surplus was reduced, most of these depots were dismantled, but some were converted into fully functional trading ports.

With the onset of war and the corporation's newly built headquarters being located dangerously close to the frontlines, Plutarch invested heavily in defensive assets.(||) To support the growing fleet of escort and patrol ships, defence outposts were constructed in key sectors of interest to PMC. While their primary purpose is to coordinate and resupply their own ships, open trading is sanctioned and Plutarch are now making a tidy profit through weapon sales.

Plutarch heavily invested in research once their primary mines started to become depleted. While initially focusing on mining equipment efficiency and recycling, Plutarch soon began to branch into other areas such as drone technology and engines.(||) Plutarch have expressed interest in establishing a research agreement with Jonferco for their upcoming highway technology, though they have yet to strike a deal.

Massive interest in their newly announced highway technology caused a surge of investment into Jonferco. This allowed them to expand their research and commercial divisions.(||) Their trading stations were designed not only to sell their goods but to provide advanced education. These stations feature libraries and presentation halls, often used for teaching of the latest theories and nurturing potential new recruits.

Jonferco's research into highways soon took over the real estate of their engine research departments at JSDD headquarters. This forced them to shift all ship and engine development to these new, state of the art stations which also double as equipment docks.

Not much is known about this station. Ties between the Beryll syndicate and Argon Government have been rumoured although there has been no official confirmation. That said, there has also been no official denial.

Jonferco attracts some of the greatest minds in the known universe and these research stations, giving researchers access to state-of-the-art labs and testing facilities are one of the main draws.(||) While not offering much for the average passer-by, these stations regularly enter the news with major breakthroughs, or the occasional minor disaster.

With Jonferco researching potentially revolutionary technologies, there was a renewed focus on defence for their assets and employees. With these defence stations and the Argon Military standing by to assist, Jonferco continues development in relative safety.

This multi-purpose craft was conceived by Argon Shipwrights as a long range reconnaissance ship for use within the Terran Solar System. It is unknown how many of these ships exist but some have been sold to major corporations as personal command ships for high-ranking executives.

page.title: Sectordescriptions
page.t: With the Argon potentially entering a long and drawn out war, they quickly claimed this sector for its resources. While not out of reach of Terran forces, military presence is low until additional infrastructure is constructed. Many colonists have called this reckless and count themselves lucky that the Terrans have not used the opportunity to gain a foothold away from the front line.

This newly colonised system excited many Boron as its primary planet matched many of the criteria they associate with paradise. Its warm, vast oceans are almost unmatched anywhere in the Boron Kingdom and even Argon tourists have begun to flock to its pristine beaches. Several deep water surveys have been launched with one being lost under mysterious circumstances, leading to the spread of sea monster tales by some Argon. This has done little to stem the tide of visitors.

With a notable asteroid field, Teladi managers expected a swarm of opportunistic miners and corporations to lay claim to this sector's many riches. Instead, they found expansion unexpectedly slow. Analysts have proposed possible causes such as the rise of mineral-rich Albion, the over-expansion of NMMC or the more profitable business of gun-running in the Argon-Terran war.

As the furthest Paranid sector from Paranid Prime, colonisation of this sector was slow but methodical. With the Argon also colonising a nearby sector, joint military exercises were proposed to the Paranid in an attempt to improve relations and efficiency in working together. Early into the second exercise, a Terran scout party jumped into the sector, shortly followed by a strike force. The joint Argon and Paranid fleet rotated their forces to contain the superior Terran ships until they were forced to jump back to Terran space. The exercises were considered a success and no further major Terran attacks have since been attempted.

With the Xenon advancing, and the loss of the gate connections to the west, Family Zyarth finds itself running out of territory and resources. This sector has been heavily mined by Family Zyarth to support ship production and the remains of its economy. Fortunately the asteroids in this sector are abundant enough to support the Split in their immediate campaign to defend against the Xenon and eventually push them back.

After having been completely wiped out by the Kha'ak, the remains here had been left untouched as a silent memorial to the countless souls who lost their lives. Plans to rebuild were held back by the fear of further reprisals, but now that the Kha'ak have been mostly wiped from the face of the known universe, Argon officials have decided to give a green light to rebuilding. While this sector may come to life and flourish once again, the scar of the tragedy runs deep and will not be forgotten.

(Void of Opportunity)This sector has long been known for its pirate activity, but is now openly claimed by a local pirate clan leader. That this is happening on the doorstep of a core Teladi sector has led to speculation that the Teladi CEO may actually be funding the pirate clan. Rumours suggest that the sector was offered to the clan as payment for the clan's loyalty. This clan is well known for its raids on high-value cargo traders. The Teladi, of course, deny all such accusations, claiming that there would be no profit in such a deal.

(Albion Delta)With Albion's latent mineral wealth, it was no surprise to see several mining corporations clamouring for mining rights. Plutarch Mining Corporation became the front-runner in the contest with their vast funds and readily available fleet of ships. Essentially becoming partners with Jonferco in the Albion endeavour, Plutarch was to showcase the Highway project as a vision of the future, improving both social and economic aspects for any system in which they are installed. The Highway research and technology itself has been withheld from Plutarch, much to the dismay of its top officials.

Bordering a dangerous Xenon system, this sector satisfied the glory-seeking Split for many years until the minor skirmishes turned into a fight for survival. As a major Xenon fleet entered the sector, the west gate mysteriously shut-down, cutting off both the supply lines and escape route.
With the Xenon approaching, the Split found themselves falling back into this desolate system. Supplies are only delivered by jumpdrive or freighter captains mad enough to brave the Xenon forces.

(Albion Alpha)Discovered during recent exploration, Albion was identified by JSDD as one of several sectors in the running to be their new Headquarters, where they could conduct research into more advanced and potentially unstable technology away from stringent Argon oversight and without placing innocent lives at risk. Following the deployment of several Jonferco-built Trans-Orbital Accelerators, the sector was rechristened Albion Alpha, and for undisclosed reasons the gate was towed to the region now known as Albion Gamma.(||)The sector now houses a mixture of high-tech factories and mines. A further facility also resides within this sector; however little information is available due to highly restricted access. This has fuelled numerous rumours about this station's purpose, the most widespread being that potentially-illegal AI research is conducted there with the knowledge and consent of the Argon government.

(Albion Beta)This region was chosen by JSDD as the second sector within the Albion system for settlement. This is most likely due to the slightly higher solar intensity which has led to this area providing most of the energy for Jonferco's operation in the system, fuelling their rapid expansion. In addition to power production facilities, this sector also houses a similar mixture of high and low tech facilities to Albion Alpha, which allows the sector to be largely self-reliant.

(Albion Gamma)Located in a vast, dense ring of debris, the Albion system quickly attracted significant interest from several mining corporations and Jonferson Space Dynamics Division. After heavy mining depleted the most easily accessible resources, Jonferco began to change the face of Albion with their Highway project. Highways promise to create a network of fast travel lanes throughout the entire system. Still under construction, until these devices are operational the gaps between developed regions are linked by Trans-Orbital Accelerators.(||)As the gateway to the Albion system, this sector is heavily patrolled by Jonferco, Plutarch and Argon vessels.

This sector was claimed under the Military Act by the Argon military authorities, to serve as a buffer for the heavily-militarised Sector M148 beyond the South gate. It is imperative for the Argon to hold M148 given previous Terran advances.

Ruined by dreams of avarice, this sector was originally claimed by a Teladi entrepreneur, eager to expand to ever greater frontiers. But within his investments at Grand Exchange lay the seeds of despair that eventually led to this sector being placed under auction, in the hope that salvation would be financial, if nothing more.

(Mercenaries Rift)This sector was ignored for a long time. Now, with the ongoing war and the associated increase in smuggling and looting activities by pirate raiders, it was just a matter of time before it would become home to one of the local pirate clans.
(Lost Order)Not much is known about what goes on in this sector. It is used as a safe haven by those who don't want to be found. Both pirates and the authorities avoid this sector for the most part.

(Quiet Tides)This serene sector was populated by the Boron to support the local economy with agricultural goods. While the nearby pirate sector may represent a threat, this sector is considered to be one of the safest; a perfect place for relaxation.

(Emperor's Pride)This sector has recently been populated by hard-line Paranid religious fanatics who chose to leave Unholy Descent after what they considered to be the sector's decline into unholiness. There is a tense and xenophobic atmosphere in the sector and very little communication exists with its neighbour.

(Unseen Domain)This sector has only recently become part of the Paranid Empire. It hosts Paranid citizens who feel that a life of exclusion and exile are the only true way to enlightenment. The Paranid in this sector have little time for lesser beings and even less inclination to have any dealings with them. This is reflected by the distinct lack of trading opportunities in the sector.

(Lasting Vengeance)This little-known sector has been occupied by the Paranid Pirate Duke and his army, known for their coldness and cruelty. Only a very few ships are allowed to enter the sector, and only a few of those dare to do business with the Duke.

(Distant Clouds)This sector, claimed only very recently, is the result of a Boron Royal Research Institute effort to scout for rare minerals in asteroid-rich sectors. Given its proximity to Boron territory and the absence of any objections from other interested parties, a major mineral survey was set in motion. Unfortunately the effort did not pay off and no particularly valuable minerals were found. It is now home to a small mining colony in the hopes that at least some of the costs can be recouped.

page.title: Script Cmd Names
page.descr: Long version of commands. These are the commands assigned to ships using the commandconsole. Page 2010 and 2011 belong together and hold short and long versions of the same commands

page.title: Script Cmd Shorts
page.descr: Short version of commands. These are the commands assigned to ships using the commandconsole. Page 2010 and 2011 belong together and hold short and long versions of the same commands

page.title: Command Info
page.t: This command will make the fleet commander call all ships assigned to its fleet to join up and be ready for fleet orders.
This command will make the ship join up with its fleet commander and be ready for fleet orders.
This command will order the fleet commander to organise an attack against a single target, using enough ships to take out the target and to protect the attacking ships.
This command will order the fleet commander to organise the fleet ships to kill all enemy ships found in the sector.
This command will order the fleet commander to defend the sector and keep it clear from any hostiles.
This command will order the fleet commander to organise a defence force to protect a given station.
This command will order the fleet commander to organise an invasion fleet to annihilate the given sector.

This command allows you to move the ship to a given position by typing the exact coordinates to fly to. The coordinates are separated by a comma, x,y,z. Using k at the end will convert the number to km.
This command will make the ship jump to your current location and follow you.
This command will make the fleet commander order ships to be resupplied and refuelled ready for their next battle.
This command will make the fleet commander order a patrol of a series of sectors.
Turret Command Alpha is a blank template for the captain to configure.
Turret Command Beta is a blank template for the captain to configure.
Turret Command Gamma is a blank template for the captain to configure.

For testing purposes, actually use credits ?
Select the \033CESC\033X key to \033RExit\033X without Saving Changes:
The following Options are available and can be set
Show Subtitle if Owned Shares Price Changes?
The Royal Boron Kingdom has decreed that access to Stock Exchanges become available at the Trade Rank of Trader
Teladi Trade Officials will grant access to Teladi Stock Exchanges upon paying a modest administration fee of 10,000 Cr.
The Split family refuse to allow trading on their Stock Exchanges unless you have demonstrated your worth. A minimum Fight Rank of Enlisted is required
Argon Trade Authorities have restricted access to the Stock Market to individuals who own at least one station in Argon space
Terran Trade Authorities have restricted access to the Stock Market to individuals who own at least one station in Terran space
The High Priest Duke has authorised individuals of Paranid Notoriety Friend of Priest to gain access to the Paranid Stock Exchanges

The Yaki, in co-operation with other clans, require you to prove your character and will allow access to their Stock Exchanges upon delivery of any of the following contraband, 7 Slaves, 14 Space Fuel, or 4 Space Weed

page.t: Close to the front lines of the Argon-Terran war, aid the Federation in any way possible with the tools at your disposal.
As an experienced member of the Terran United Space Command, you have vast resources to aid you in the war effort.
This starts a ***modified*** game. All storylines are disabled.
