page.title: Argon/Terran Male Variation 3
page.t: Hej! To bylo doufám jen omylem!
Radši mě nech na pokoji nebo z tebe bude hvězdný prach!
Dělej to dál a budeš toho litovat!
Sám jsem ti to říkal! Radši zmiz a někam se schovej!
Kdokoli, pomozte prosím! Útočí na mě!
Létáš asi tak obratně jako velký asteroid!
Uvidíme se na onom světě! Arrrgh!
Hádej, jakou šanci máš, že to vyhraješ... Jo, právě jsi prohrál!
Už tě nebudeme příště varovat. Prostě zemřeš!
Není nějaká hvězda, ke které bys měl letět?
Pleteš si mě s někým, koho by to zajímalo.
To je nějaký špatný vtip, ne?
OK, vzdávám to, vystřeluji se... vezmi si loď!
Tak, vezmi si náklad a nech mě na pokoji.
Tak teď by sis chtěl popovídat, co? Škoda!
Nemám čas zastavovat a plkat. Najdi si někoho jiného, koho chceš otravovat.
Musíš mít problém s komunikačním zařízením, promluv s někým jiným.
Vzdát-se? Tak to ne - vypadni, nebo chcípni.
Podívej se kolem, chytráku... Jsi tu!
Vypadá to, že vezeš kontraband. Hoď ho přes palubu, nebo poneseš následky.
Nebudeme to opakovat. Odhoď ilegální zboží.
Na našem skenu není žádný kontraband. Díky za trpělivost.
Nevšiml sis, že ti v lodi nějak rychle dochází kyslík?
Tohle už nebudu snášet. Nech mě být!
Tenhle náklad bude můj. Zahoď ho, nebo toho budeš litovat.
Tak teď sis vyzkoušel odhazovací mechanismus, tak odhoď i zbytek!
Pomoc! Někdo mi musí pomoct zbavit se toho idiota.
Děláš tu dobrou práci... budu se jenom dívat.
Jsem zaměřen, raketa se na mě zaměřila!
Měl bych něco, co by tě mohlo zajímat.
Hledám někoho, kdo za mě vyzvedne nějaké zboží.
Mám tu pasažéra, který potřebuje dopravu.
Potřebuji se odsud dostat, a to rychle.
Potřebuji, aby mi někdo postavil stanici.
Hledám někoho, kdo by pro mě pracoval
Jo, mám pro tebe další práci.
To je přesně to, co potřebujeme...
Tahle mise by měla být snadná.
Tohle může být trochu těžká mise.
Tahle mise by neměla trvat dlouho.
Tahle práce ti může zabrat nějaký čas.
Možná bys měl očekávat po cestě nepřátele.
Dej pozor na policii při plnění této mise.
Pozor na nepřátele při plnění této mise.
Díky, bez tebe bych to nezvládl.
Ujde to. Mohl ses ale víc snažit.
Na tohle bys potřeboval bojovou loď.
Na tohle bys potřeboval transportní loď
A teď mě dovez na místo určení!
Potřebuješ do svého nákladového prostoru systém podpory života, jinak nemůžeš přepravovat pasažéry!
Do toho nevlezu, sežeň si osobní transportér.
Napadni a znič všechny nepřátelské lodi!
Ustup a znovu se seskup u velitelství!
Řekli jsme si, že zaskočíme a vyřešíme za tebe problémy.
Dobrá práce, pilote. Vrať se na základnu kvůli opravám.
Musel bys uvolnit svůj nákladový prostor.
Přistaň tu, abych mohl převést zboží.
To nemůžu odeslat otevřenými kanály, přistaň a já ti data pošlu.
Na co čekáš? Pohni s tím!
Tvé stálé služby musíme odměnit. Trváme na tom, abys převzal tento předmět jako znamení naší přízně.
Naše skeny odhalily, že přepravuješ nelegálního pasažéra. Okamžitě tuto osobu pusť.
Tak jo, přijď znovu, když si to rozmyslíš.

page.title: Argon/Terran Male Variation 4
page.t: Hej! Jsi snad slepý, hloupý nebo oboje?
Už to nebudu opakovat, nech toho.
To je pro tebe poslední šance - nech toho.
Překročil jsi hranici, už to stačilo.
Útočí na mě, potřebuji okamžitě pomoct.
Nacpu ti svůj výfuk do krku!
Uvidíme se na onom světě! Arrrgh!
Pilote, ani nevíš, jak blízko smrti teď jsi. Nech toho.
Tvoje ignorance mě překvapuje. Zastav palbu.
Zbraňové systémy zaměřeny. Máš poslední přání?
K tomu teď není dobrá doba.
To je skvělé! Přesně to jsem potřeboval.
Už toho nech! Vystřeluji se! Je tvoje!
Vystřeluji náklad! Tak si ho vem!
Komunikační kanál otevřen. Mluví velitel. Co potřebuješ?
Měl bys věřit, že štíty vydrží. Jsem pěkně naštvaný!
Táhni z mého komunikačního kanálu! Mám tu práci!
Nemám ti co říct, pilote. Ani teď ani jindy.
Vzdát se? Už to nekuř, pilote. Fakt už to nehul.
Jasně, nastav svůj navigační počítač na směr
Jsi přesně tam, kde chceš být, troubo.
Netuším. Fakt o tom nic nevím.
Jasně, to je to nejmenší. Nastav si traťové body na
Hlídka sektoru pilotovi. Tvůj náklad je kontraband. Okamžitě ho odhoď.
Poslední varování, odhoď zboží, nebo začneme střílet.
To není loď, kterou hledáme. Pokračuj.
Už mě štveš, rozdělíme se po dalším přistání.
Už jsem na tebe chvíli čekal. Je čas odhodit ten náklad.
Ach... ne najednou, to je jasné.
Mám tě na mušce... nehraj si se mnou...
Volám podporu, potřebuji trochu víc sil na tohohle pitomce!
Ne teď, je to na tobě!
Jak může někdo tak hnusnej jako ty mít jenom jednu hlavu?
Nastavuji kurs k útoku na nepřítele!
Ztrácím štíty! Už to dlouho nevydržím!
Reaktor už je na kritické hodnotě!
Jsou všude kolem! Je jich moc!
Napíšu ti nekrolog, už se těším.
Už je to víc, než dokážu snést, mizím!
Mám něco, co by tě mohlo zajímat.
Potřebuji kurýra, který pro mě převeze nějaké zboží.
Mám tu cíl, který je nutné neutralizovat.
Je tu jeden pasažér, kterého potřebuji převést.
Potřebuji se odsud dostat, a to hodně rychle.
Hledám někoho, kdo mi postaví stanici.
Potřebuji někoho, kdo pro mě doveze nějaké zboží.
Jasně, vždycky pro tebe budu mít práci.
Hej, tady je pro tebe nějaká další práce.
Co myslíš, dokážeš tuhle práci dokončit?
Tohle je přesně to, co jsme potřebovali.
Tato mise by měla být velmi snadná.
Tahle mise ti nebude trvat dlouho.
Touto prací asi strávíš nějaký čas.
Měl by sis dát pozor na hlídky v sektorech při plnění této mise.
Buď ve střehu, budeš si muset dávat během této mise pozor na nepřátele.
Dobrá práce, bez tebe bych to nedokázal.
Asi to stačí. Mohl by ses ale příště zlepšit.
Děláš si srandu? Jdi mi z očí.
Odpočítává se ti čas a ten pomalu dochází.
Jsi šílený?! Co to do tebe vjelo?!
Promiň, potřebuji někoho, komu už neteče mléko po bradě.
Budeš k tomu potřebovat bojovou loď.
Budeš k tomu potřebovat loď se slušně velkým nákladovým prostorem.
Budeš potřebovat loď, která je schopná skákat do jiných sektorů.
Budeš potřebovat mít nainstalované transportní zařízení.
Přestaň se šklebit a jdi na ně!
Teď mě doprav do cílové destinace!
Chci pryč z této lodi. A hned!
Díky za svezení! Tak zase někdy.
Myslíš si, že se sem vejdu? To snad nemyslíš vážně!
A co mám asi dýchat? Sežeň podporu života do nákladového prostoru!
Myslíš si, že poletím touhle rachotinou? Sežeň osobní transport!
Tvoje loď je tak prázdná jako tvoje hlava. Sežeň si nějaké vybavení.
Pohni, napadni a zaútoč na nepřátele.
Stáhni se, musíme se přeskupit u velitelské základny!
Vypadá to, že by se ti hodila pomoc. Co takhle zlikvidovat ty nepřátele?
Výborně. Přistaň se svou lodí na základně k opravám.
Podívej se na svůj skener! Blíží se
Musíš vyložit nějaký náklad, nezbývá ti prostor.
Přistaň, abych mohl naložit tvůj náklad.
Nemohu riskovat komunikaci v otevřené řeči. Přistaň a já ti pošlu data.
Pohni se svou lodí do doku, pilote.
Nejsi dostatečně blízko, pohni se trochu.
Pozor s tou lodí! Jsi příliš blízko!
Promiň, už pro tebe nemám práci.
Tvá práce nezůstane bez odměny. Vezmi si to.
Naše skeny odhalují, že vezeš neregistrovanou formu života. Propusť okamžitě svého pasažéra.
Fajn, když si to rozmyslíš, víš, kde mě najdeš.

page.title: Argon/Terran Female Variation 3
page.t: Vypadám snad jako Yaki? Nech toho!
Tvoje pozornost se mi nelíbí, pilote. Aktivuji zbraně.
Jestli poškodíš moje zboží, tak si buď jistý, že poškodím to tvoje.
Přecházím do útoku, jsi zaměřen a budeš zničen.
Útočí na mě! Potřebuji okamžitě pomoct!
Hej, tak jsem to nemyslela. Prosím, přestaň s tím!
Systémy přestávají fungovat, podpora života taky!
Tvůj zaměřovací systém má asi poruchu. Nech toho!
Zatraceně! Pilote, mám tě zaměřeného! Poslední varování!
Mám tě zaměřeného. To je ale nádherný tón!
Tvoje jediná mozková buňka se musí cítit osaměle, co?
Promiň, o tom ti nemůžu dát žádné informace.
Možná jsi roztomilý, ale strašně hloupý.
Máš svůj mozek v karanténě, pilote?
A blýská se to! Nový cíl pro mé zbraně!
Mizím. Najdu si tě... a pak se pomstím.
Náklad je pryč. A už mě nech!
Doufám, že máš dobrý důvod, proč jsi mě zavolal, pilote.
Už nebudu mluvit, slaďouši. Ale ještě jsem nepřestala bojovat.
Sakra. Mám dost práce. Nemám čas na tlachání.
Jo, ráda bych ti pomohla, ale asi se to v blízké době nestane.
Pilote, bojovala jsem s Kha'aky v Omicron Lyrae. Vzdát se? Nikdy.
Jsi roztomilý, ale ne moc chytrý. Už tu jsi!
To nemám na svých navigačních mapách. Promiň.
Když budeš něco potřebovat, tak víš, kde mě najdeš.
Bezpečnostní složky sektoru, zastav motory a odhoď náklad!
Nebudu to opakovat, vezeš ilegální zboží. Odhoď ho, nebo začnu střílet.
Tady jsou bezpečnostní složky sektoru, můžeš pokračovat. Dobrý let.
Sakra! Co to je, výlet? Moje máma létá rychleji než ty!
Chci z tohohle vraku pryč, další zastávku vystupuji.
No skvělé! Tohle zboží by se vyjímalo krásně v mém nákladovém prostoru.
To je moje děťátko, pojď k mamince.
No to není dost, to mi nestačí... ještě odhoď něco, ještě něco...
Potřebuji trochu krycí palby, tenhle mi trochu zatápí!
Ne, chci tě pro jednou vidět střílet samotného.
Už letím!.. Sakra! Moc mluvíš a málo bojuješ.
Sakra, jak jsi hnusný, tak jsi hloupý.
To není dobré, to není dobré! V trupu jsou díry!
Visí mi za zadkem! Nemůžu se jich zbavit!
Reaktor už dosahuje kritických hodnot, asi vybuchne!
Nemůžu je ani spočítat, je jich příliš mnoho!
Doufám, že budeš křičet mé jméno, až tvá loď shoří.
Mizím! Nemá cenu skončit tu takhle.
Tohle se nevyvíjí úplně podle mých představ. Letím pryč!
Raketa už mě vyhledává, pověsila se na mě!
Skoro jsem nedoufala, ale stihls to!
Mám práci, která by se ti mohla líbit.
Potřebuji, abys za mě vyzvedl náklad.
Mám tu cíl, který je nutné zničit.
Musím se odtud sakra dostat, a to rychle!
Potřebuji, aby někdo schopný pro mě postavil stanici.
Chtěla bych, abys pro mě dovezl nějaké zboží.
Hledám někoho, kdo pro mě bude ochoten pracovat.
Vypadá to, že bych ti mohla něco nabídnout.
Má u tebe tahle práce zelenou?
Tahle mise by ti neměla dělat problém.
Možná se u této mise trochu zapotíš.
Možná bude tato mise docela obtížná.
Tahle mise je krátká a jednoduchá.
Na této misi strávíš dlouhou dobu.
Dej si během této mise pozor na policii.
Drž se při zemi a dej při této misi pozor na nepřátele.
Skvělé... určitě bych to bez tebe nezvládla.
Myslím, že to bude muset stačit. Mohl ses ale víc snažit.
Pěkně jsi to podělal. Zmiz mi z očí!
Zrušit! Zrušit! Tahle mise pro tebe skončila!
Hej! Kam myslíš, že jdeš! Ještě jsme neskončili.
Podívej se na svůj navigační systém, pilote!
No a co? Projel jsi to! Úplně jsi to projel!
Určitě ne, potřebuji někoho, kdo má zkušenosti.
Budeš pro to potřebovat loď vybavenou pro boj.
Pro tohle je potřeba hyperprostorový motor.
Transportní zařízení je pro to potřeba.
Dveře jsou zajištěny, jsem na palubě.
Vidíš to ovládání trysek? Tak ho použij!
Nech mě vystoupit z tohohle vraku!
Díky, že jsi mě sem dostal v pořádku.
Možná jsem malá, ale nešil, vejdu se na palubu!
Myslíš, že tu budu zadržovat dech? Sežeň si systém podpory života pro nákladový prostor!
Tak to ne - buď si sežeň osobní transportér, nebo se nemáme o čem bavit.
Viděla jsem už lépe vybavené Gonery. Sežeň si nějaké vybavení.
Myslíš, že je to v pořádku? Podívej se na mě! Není to v pořádku! Sakra!
Zvol nejkratší kurs a znič všechny nepřátele.
Stáhni se, musíme se přeskupit u velitelské základny!
Skvělé. Další palebná síla přiletěla z brány
No, jestli to není kavalerie. Je skvělé, že jste s námi.
Vzchopte se, lidi! Nepřátelské lodi vylétávají z brány
Super! Vrať se na základnu a proveď nezbytné opravy.
Už se nesměj a vylez z postele! Blíží se
Nastav kurs k zásahu! Pohni se!
V dosahu jsou miny, zahajte únikové manévry!
Zůstaň ve střehu. Budeme potřebovat krytí.
Co, zešílel jsi? Už nemáš místo. Musíš odhodit nějaký náklad.
Potřebuješ tu přistát, pak ti mohu předat zboží, co potřebuješ.
Nechci to dělat otevřeně. Přistaň a my ti dáme data.
Skvělé, máš tu loď! Přistaň tady!
Je nějaký důvod, proč si dáváš na čas? Udělej to!
Nejsi ještě v dosahu, ještě o kousek blíž.
Pozor na vzdálenost! Leť dál! Hned!
Promiň, nemáme pro tebe teď nic.
Poctil jsi nás svými loajálními službami. Chceme tě za tvé úsilí odměnit.
Bezpečnostní služba sektoru. Zdá se, že vezeš nelegálního pasažéra. Propusť ho, nebo budeme střílet!
Prosím přijď později, pokud změníš názor.
Nic si z toho nedělej. Zkusíš to znovu.

page.title: Commander Derik
page.t: How can I be of assistance?

Good to meet you, pilot. I'm Commander Derik, you're just in time to meet the other new recruits. As one of the more experienced flyboys of this group, we've seen fit to give you the rank of Sergeant. Please, form up with the others; I will soon begin the briefing for your first flight.
This is Commander Derik to all members of the Argon Special Task Force 87. I'm transmitting coordinates to your navigational computers; form up at this location for briefing and assignment.

Well it seems you nuggets can at least follow waypoints. I'm Commander Derik, the commanding officer of Argon Special Task Force 87. While I'm sure you all know the challenges we face, I want to reiterate our duty in defending the Argon Federation and her allies.

We are at war with an enemy we know all too well, the Terrans; our brothers in blood. Our job is to forget that and just protect our civilians and our territory. Be this on the front line, escorting freighters or deploying Laser Towers at every gate from here to Argon Prime, we will be where we are needed.

We will represent the best of what the Community of Planets has to offer. Not all of you are fighter pilots or trade moguls. We are not all even the same species and that diversity is what makes us strong in fighting for this common goal.

Now, that's enough for the rousing speeches, we've got work to do. Several sectors on the Argon-Terran border are in a state of conflict. We have a network of agents on installations throughout these sectors who are offering tasks which need immediate attention. Do your best to help bail these souls out of the crazola until we contact you for Task Force duty. Good luck out there pilots, show those Terrans what the best of the Commonwealth can do.
Sergeant, you've been doing some good work so far. We've prepared a special task just for you, return to homebase as soon as you can.

Sergeant, we have a situation with the Jonferson Space Dynamics Division or Jonferco. We've had reports of advanced Jonferco technology finding its way onto Terran ships and with the corporation's past ties to the Terrans, we are beginning an investigation.

A contact within Jonferco HQ informs us that a meeting will shortly take place in the Albion sector between Jonferco and a potential buyer. All signs point to a demonstration of new technology developed in Albion.

You will wait in Albion for the meeting to take place and report back on the proceedings. Whatever happens there, do not get involved. The last thing we need to do is to draw more attention to the Albion sector. You will need a few specialised tools for this mission, so we are providing you with a suitable ship. Good luck.

Sergeant, we have received word that the meeting is already underway. You must find the Jonferco Command Ship somewhere in your sector. We have engaged listening protocols on your ship's computer so you can intercept their ship-to-ship communications. Again, do not get drawn into any conflict; at the first sign of trouble, disengage and return to base. We will be monitoring communications remotely. Derik out.
Jonferco ships have entered the sector. Hold position and wait for the others.
Paranid!? What are they doing here? We're going to radio silence, try to get as much information as possible but don't get too close.

Sergeant, while that meeting didn't involve the Terrans, it did answer a few questions about their recent activities. While I'm sure eyebrows will be raised about the Paranid being involved, we still have no proof that Jonferco are directly trading technology with the Terrans. We will continue to contact them through official channels for clarification on where they stand.
You did well today. Feel free to go about your business, we will contact you again when we have another task for you.

If you want to take some R and R away from the front, I hear some of the other pilots have been trying to play the Stock Market. If you play it right, it's easy money without needing a fleet of freighters. If you get it wrong, well, you can always eat in the mess and the cost will be deducted from your next paycheque.
Sergeant, please return to Sector M148. There have been developments with Jonferco.
Thank you for returning promptly, Sergeant. I believe you've already met Administrator Colbern of Jonferco?
Administrator Colbern was just proposing a very interesting arrangement. Something I think is quite suited to your skillset.

Jonferco are just as concerned with finding their technology on Terran ships as we are. You will be tasked with aiding Jonferco in protecting their ships and continuing the investigation into how the Terrans have gotten access to this research. You will report to Administrator Colbern for assignments but be aware that you could be pulled back to front line service at any time.

I've arranged for control of a new ship to be transferred to you for this mission. Additional support ships will be standing by if needed, but we don't want to draw attention to the convoy unless necessary. Dismissed.
This is Derik. We're redirecting nearby forces to Interworlds. Hang in there and stay away from the gates.
Support ships are on their way. They will clear the north gate, then head south. Sergeant, join them when you can.
They're attempting to blockade the gate. Close in but beware of that capital ship.
Sergeant, stay out of range of that capital ship. It'll tear you to shreds!
This is Derik to all ships, disengage and regroup in Wastelands.
Paranid forces have entered the sector and are engaging the Terrans! All ships, get back in there and give them a hand!

Good work out there Sergeant. Colbern and I will oversee the handover of the JSDD research to the Paranid. I'll contact you when we have tasks for you. You're on a roll. See if you can be of use in the conflicted sectors. Derik out.

Jonferco Headquarters has been lost. Survivors are on several ships leaving the combat area. Multiple Terran ships and Orbital Lasers remain. Destroy those Orbital Lasers to clear the way for our capital ships.
As you can expect, Colbern has his hands full. Along with their Headquarters, several Jonferco ships were targeted by the Terrans. We are still not sure why.

Jonferco is in a vulnerable position, as is Albion. This sector is very important to the war effort and the future of the Community of Planets. Jonferco was tasked with defending the sector but with their remaining forces so stretched, we doubt they can fulfil that obligation. Argon Command can't commit any further forces away from the war. We must aid Albion and Jonferco in any way possible.
There are some tasks Colbern would like to see completed. We will upload the mission information to your ship-board computer.
This is Commander Derik to all Task Force ships, we have a situation in Albion; a group of ships are attempting to raid a Jonferco research station. Render assistance immediately.

Sergeant, there is another Research Station in Albion which is crucial to the war effort. They have not yet been attacked but it's just a matter of time. We would like you to bolster their defences with Laser Towers. We will send you information on their location.

You handled the Beryll well, Sergeant. We never know what to expect with those people, always playing with AI technology and Xenon. If they weren't so crucial to the war effort, they would be in a penal colony.

The situation in Albion seems to be calming down. The Plutarch Mining Corporation has surprisingly taken up security duty for the whole sector while Jonferco gets back on its feet. Colbern has requested that we take a look at the Highway construction areas; pirates have been seen scanning and salvaging them. If they are still there, take them out.

Things are looking up in Albion. The security situation has improved and people are starting to flood into the sector. It seems that Jonferco's promise of highways bringing prosperity is not falling on deaf ears.
On the other hand, while we've been babysitting Jonferco, the front lines have taken a beating. Head over there and see what you can do to aid some of the sectors in conflict.
Return to homebase. We have a breakthrough in the Jonferco investigation.

We have had a tip off from someone claiming to know how the Terrans got hold of Jonferco technology and why the Terrans are attacking JSDD assets. The contact said that he or she will meet us at a neutral location.

You know it is. You have already told us you work for PMC so I assume it is someone within your corporation. I also assume that you want to benefit from giving us information, so what are your demands?
What could he possibly have told the Terrans to make them systematically attack Jonferco the way they did?
It sounds tarnished enough already. What mistake is he about to make?
Director Falos, I seriously hope you're wrong about this.
There's too many ships for us to engage and reinforcements won't get here fast enough.
Let's see how loyal your PMC crews are. This is Commander Derik of the Argon Special Task Force. I am countermanding your orders to not engage, defend the Jonferco station!
Sound the evacuation orders. We'll do what we can.
Come on people, take them out! Protect the evacuating ships!
Scanner is clear, that's the lot of them.
All PMC ships, stand down. With immediate effect, you are to follow all orders from Lieutenant Falk Borman of the Argon Special Task Force while this incident is being investigated.

Director Falos, I suggest you prepare your evidence and inform your board of directors of the upcoming inquiry. If PMC is to survive, you will all have to defend it. Your corporation has a lot to answer for.

Sergeant, this mess will take an age to clear up and we've been distracted long enough. Go to the Beryll Research Station, You'll find something of use there. Take it and do what you can for the war effort. Thank you for your service in this matter. Your performance and dedication have been outstanding. Derik out.

Pilot, this really was a missed opportunity. While this meeting didn't involve Terrans, it did involve the Paranid. Knowing how far their dealings went would have given us leverage over Jonferco in this investigation. Go about your business, we will contact you again when we have a task for you.
Thank you Lord Captain. Please stand by while the transport resumes its course.
All ships, Terran vessels are attacking Jonferco Headquarters. Render immediate assistance.

page.title: Administrator Colbern
page.t: Sorry, I don't have that information.

Up ahead we have the highway construction area. It takes us several weeks to build and configure each gate but we have several production lines and are investing in more avenues of research to speed up the process.
No. Our first tests were scheduled for two weeks' time but the escalation of the war has forced us to rethink our timetable.

We also anticipated this outcome, so I have authority to provide you with all of our highway research and three prototype highway gates. I'm sure your scientists will be able to verify our findings. These highways will be powerful tools, opening up entire solar systems in a way we had never before dreamed possible. As with all powerful technologies though, it can be abused. We trust that you will use it wisely.
It pleases me to hear that.
Unfortunately, we must pause proceedings. We have detected a suspicious ship nearby, it could be attempting to listen in on our conversation.
Yes, it was a brief encounter, but one that almost ruined months of work. Still, I understand why the military wants to keep tabs on us during a war, especially with these accusations.

We are aware of a possible leak within Jonferco and in addition to that, the Terrans are actively attacking our assets. Our focus is still to continue developing the Highway technology and building a test bed in Albion, but with these constant attacks and a potential leak, it is becoming quite difficult.

The first job is one you are already familiar with. We are delivering several prototype highway gates to the Paranid. The ship carrying the gates is already en-route. Please join the escort group while it travels to the drop-off point.
Derik, we have to go, now! That station is only protected by PMC ships.
I'll be damned, he wasn't bluffing.
The mercenary fleet is moving towards the station! We won't get there in time.
Thank you Commander, we are indebted to you.

page.title: Lord Captain Rimanckosalt
page.t: What do you want of us?
Check your gravidar! You're already there!
I don't need to know that.
Are there any working prototypes of these devices for you to demonstrate?

You bring us here with false promises and nothing to show but a dead husk of metal. We anticipated this deceitful possibility, and I have the authority to sever negotiations with your lowerlife company. What do you offer us to prevent this?

This offer would be acceptable to us. I am accustomed to Argon being short-sighted and unworthy of our attention, it is agreeable to see some Argon attempting to emulate Paranid levels of foresight and preparation.
Indeed. That ship reeks of Argon Secret Service. It appears that your security leaves much to be desired. Let us hope that your designers are of a better calibre.
The Paranid Empire will not tolerate further Terran incursions towards its space. We will intervene when we deem necessary.

page.title: Beryll Researcher Leea Kaswin
page.t: How can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.

Thank you for your assistance. Without Jonferco patrolling Albion, things have started to go downhill fast. We've not been able to secure our supply lines and are running low on several vital resources. If you could provide them, we would be grateful.
Thank you again, Sergeant. I have spoken with Commander Derik regarding further work you can do for us.

This Research Station is where we develop new drone technologies based on the Terraformer and Xenon ships. It was this technology which turned the war to our favour in the Solar System and led to the Torus over Earth being destroyed.

However, we are still running low on materials. We need several Xenon ships to continue our line of research. If you could acquire and deliver these ships to us we will reward you in some of the technology we have been developing.
Great work. This will keep us busy for a while. If you take a look at the ships docked at this station, you will see that some have been gifted to you. You've earned them.

page.title: JSDD TL Captain
page.t: JSDD Transport, how can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.
All escorts, form up and stay alert. We're continuing towards the south gate.
Be advised, we've detected Terran ships in the sector. Their target is unknown. Argon Military are on their way.
The Terrans are targeting us! Take them out.
This is too much, we're heading back. Escorts, hang back and provide us with a rear-guard.
Thanks for the help Sergeant. We'll stay out of trouble from here on.

page.title: PMC Patrol Captain
page.t: How can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.
Hey! What do you think you are doing? This is our patrol, buzz off!

page.title: Falos Disanos Hunas I
page.t: How can I be of assistance?
Sorry, I don't have that information.

Greetings. I am Falos Disanos Hunas I, Director of Economic Development at Plutarch Mining Corporation. I have uncovered information which I know you would be most interested in; why the Terrans have so viciously targeted Jonferco and how the Terrans gained Jonferco research information. This is valuable information to you, yes?
Simply that you understand that I, nor any other at PMC could stop it. All of these deeds are down to the CEO of the Plutarch Mining Corporation himself.
Yes. By using spies throughout Jonferco, he sold much information to the Terrans. So much profit, but, he sought a larger prize, something he could not control while Jonferco remained so strong.

That they constructed the Terraformer fleet which ravaged their territory. Once Jonferco could no longer protect Albion, mercenaries were hired to raid your remaining research facilities and cause chaos in Albion. I have proof for you to review but time is short. Landon is about to make a fatal mistake which will tarnish this corporation forever.
He will take a mercenary fleet to Albion and destroy the Jonferco research station, their last major hold in the sector.
I am not. But remember that the people of PMC itself will not take part in this attack. Our crews will not hesitate to assist us if we order them.
Landon! He's in there somewhere! The PMC ships are following his orders not to engage. They cannot ignore this threat further. Order them to attack.
As will we. This madness has to stop and we have just the ship for the job!
Understood Commander. However, I believe the one responsible has just met a fitting end. I await our next meeting.

page.title: Argon War Commander
page.t: (Argon Jupiter_01 Start){3949,3001}{3949,3010}{3949,1020412}{3949,3102}(using Asteroid Belt since Jupiter is missing)
(War Commander Lines - Contact Player)Pilot, this is Argon Command.
(Contact many)All ships, this is Argon Command.
(Invade)We are about to make a push for (sector)
(Deploy Static)We need to deploy static defences in (sector)
(Deploy Mines)We need to limit their ship movements with mines in (sector)
(Build Stations)We need to establish a new foothold. Construct stations in (sector)
(Protect Convoy)Our freighters are coming under attack, defend them in (sector)
(Protect Stations)Our stations won't last long without backup. Fend the Terrans off in (sector)
(Destroy Static)They're fortifying their position with static defences in (sector)
(Destroy Mines)We've lost several ships to mines in (sector)
(Destroy Stations)They're dug in deep. We need to take out some of their stations in (sector)
(Investigate Ships)We've lost contact with everything in (sector)
(Final order - Go)You have your orders. Get it done.
(Final order - Investigate)Find out what's happening there.
Stand by for an update regarding the recent developments in the conflicted sectors.
This is Argon Command, this is the situation on the front-line.
The war has taken some bad turns.
We have taken some considerable losses.
We are successfully holding off the Terrans in several areas.
Fighting continues in several sectors with heavy losses on both sides.
We have pushed the Terrans back time and again and the momentum is clearly on our side.
We are making some great progress in our fight against the Terrans.
The last Terran push saw them gain control of
is back in the hands of the Terrans.
came under heavy attack and suffered losses.

page.title: Terran War Commander
page.t: (Terran Jupiter_01 Start){3950,3001}{3950,3017}{3950,1020412}{3950,3101}(using Asteroid Belt since Jupiter is missing)
All ships, this is Terran Command.
We need to deploy static defences in
We need to limit ship movements with mines in
We're going to build stations and gain a foothold in
You need to keep their ships away from our freighters in
Some of their ships are harassing our stations in
They're trying to fortify their position with static defence in
Enemy mines have been detected in
We're sending you to take out some of their stations in
Some of our ships haven't reported in from
You have your orders, get it done.
Stand by for an update regarding the recent developments in the conflict.
This is Terran Command, the situation on the front-lines is as follows.
The enemy has made some gains over us.
We have lost contact with a number of captains.
The enemy has made no serious progress into our territory.
We have made significant gains in line with our expectations.
We are making excellent progress in the campaign.
We have pushed them out of
We have withdrawn our forces from
is no longer under our control.
is under the enemy's sphere of influence.
came under heavy attack and suffered losses.

page.title: Player Lines [TEXT]
page.t: I'm here to join the Task Force.

page.title: Albion Prelude Plot
page.descr: Texts for Albion Prelude Plot Mission.
page.t: Join the Argon Special Task Force for duty assignment in the Argon-Terran war.
Aid the war effort by accepting jobs on the front line or by pushing back the Terran forces.

Jonferco technology is somehow finding its way into the hands of the Terrans. A contact within their headquarters suggests that an important meeting is soon to take place in Albion between Jonferco representatives and an unknown party.
Derik suggests that the stock market presents an opportunity to make some quick money. Take a look.

Jonferco has proposed an arrangement with the Argon Special Task Force to secure their operations against Terran aggression. Escort a Jonferco {lookup.class.name@tl}, laden with prototype highways for the Paranid.
The Jonferco HQ has been attacked. Render assistance!
With the destruction of their HQ, many Jonferco operations have been disrupted. Aid them in getting their assets and personnel back to safe space.
With Jonferco's security forces still recovering, pirates have seemingly taken advantage of the situation and are raiding several areas of Albion.
Aid the Beryll researchers located in Albion.
The Plutarch Mining Corporation has taken on security duty for the Albion sectors while the pirate presence persists.
A contact claims to have information regarding the leak of Jonferco research.
An attacking fleet is bearing down on the remaining Jonferco base in Albion, allegedly lead by the Plutarch CEO. Defend the station at all costs.

page.title: Common Mission Lines
page.t: Completing this mission will deal a crippling blow to our enemies.
This task is of utmost importance to the war effort.
Completion of this task will aid the war effort immeasurably.

page.title: L2 Generic Assassination
page.t: An ace {lookup.race.name@{param@EnemyRace}} pilot has been causing us all sorts of trouble; disrupting supplies and plundering freighters. This must stop, by any means necessary.

page.title: L2 Transport Cargo
page.t: As squad leader for some military reserves, it's up to me to keep the lads organised, ready to go and of sound mind. Unfortunately, I think I've pushed them too far and I'd like to make up for it by getting them a little something. I need someone to pick up some bottles of {lookup.typename.name@SS_WARE_DUMMY32}. That's the good stuff!

My name is {actor.name@L2M116 Offer.1 Guide} and I have a food requisition order. Our troops and pilots are not enjoying the cold reaches of the Solar System and morale is getting low. If we could get some {lookup.typename.name@SS_WARE_LFOODSTUFF} it would do them a world of good!

page.title: L2 Deploy Object
page.descr: Texts for deploy object generic mission
page.t: You will be reimbursed the cost( of the deployed object).
(End)We are transferring the {value@L2M142.Reward} credits you've earned.
(Partial Success)Well, I suppose it will have to do. {3342,2}

Your time is up and you failed to deploy anything. I hope you know how disastrous this is! I can only hope that the enemy doesn't attack this sector before we've gotten someone more competent to do the job.
